bibl.title: SB 6.9025, Cotton, and the Economy of the Small Oasis. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: P. Mich. Inv. 3630 (= S.B. VI, 9025): text (with a few changes) and revised translation. The cotton and the goods to be sent are shown to be those characteristically produced in the oases and shipped to the Valley. It is argued that the place of writing is probably the Small Oasis.
bibl.seg: BAGNALL Roger S., SB 6.9025, Cotton, and the Economy of the Small Oasis. Avec résumé en anglais.

P. Mich. Inv. 3630 (= S.B. VI, 9025): text (with a few changes) and revised translation. The cotton and the goods to be sent are shown to be those characteristically produced in the oases and shipped to the Valley. It is argued that the place of writing is probably the Small Oasis.
